Synopsis: Searches for a specific command by name.
Description: This function checks if a command with the specified name exists in the current session.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Search-Command -CommandName "Get-Process"
Returns $true if the command "Get-Process" exists, otherwise $false.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Search-Command -CommandName "UnknownCommand"
Returns $false as "UnknownCommand" does not exist as a command.
